mapper.select: SELECT sino, title, startdate, enddate FROM surveyInfo WHERE sysdate BETWEEN startdate AND enddate
SELECT sqno qno, sqbody body, sq_sino sino, sqgroup FROM surveyQuest WHERE sq_sino = #{sino} AND sqno = sqgroup ORDER BY sqgroup ASC
SELECT sqno qno, sqbody ex, exno, sq_sino sino, sqgroup FROM surveyQuest WHERE sqgroup = #{qno} AND exno is NOT NULL ORDER BY exno ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO survey(sno, smno, srv_qno) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(sno) + 1, 100001) FROM survey), (SELECT mno FROM member WHERE id = #{id}), #{qno} )
mapper.select: SELECT sqno qno, exno, sqbody ex, NVL(cnt, 0) cnt, total totalCnt, ROUND(NVL(cnt, 0) / total * 100, 2) per FROM surveyQuest, ( SELECT srv_qno, count(*) cnt FROM survey GROUP BY srv_qno ), ( SELECT count(*) total FROM ( SELECT smno FROM survey, surveyQuest WHERE srv_qno = sqno AND sq_sino = #{sino} GROUP BY smno ) ) WHERE sqno = srv_qno(+) AND sqgroup = #{sqgroup} AND exno IS NOT NULL ORDER BY exno
SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT smno FROM survey, surveyQuest WHERE sqno = srv_qno AND sq_sino = #{sino} GROUP BY smno HAVING smno = ( SELECT mno FROM member WHERE id = #{id} ) )
SELECT exiname id, expname title, exploc body, exisdate startdate, exiedate enddate FROM exinfo, explace WHERE sysdate BETWEEN exisdate AND exiedate AND exiexpno=expno
